[The point is, if it was someone asking when a ghost died, or the name, the=
n it would be considered irrefutable evidence, if it's 2012, then it has to=
 be bogus cuz everyone knows better.]

I don't know who you've been talking=
 to, but not in my world.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Frank Su=
mption 
  To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, October 14, 2009 =
5:05 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Don't be alarmed, it's just imagination! [1 At=
tachment]


    [Attachment(s) from Frank Sumption included below] 



   O=
r that's the reasoning when "they" don't say what is expected. This is from=
 just minutes ago, I asked about 2012--which no doubt colors the response. =
The point is, if it was someone asking when a ghost died, or the name, then=
 it would be considered irrefutable evidence, if it's 2012, then it has to =
be bogus cuz everyone knows better.  

   Frank-S
